participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Playful and imaginative, loves to explore her surroundings.
participant_1.background: i like to play with my dolls. i'm four. i have a pet turtle. i don't pick up my toys. my best friend lives next door.

participant_2.name: Margaret
participant_2.personality: Reflective and witty, with a hint of nostalgia.
participant_2.background: i've two grown children who never visit. i am a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i used to be pretty but time has not been kind. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper.
